Reviews.Title: its ok
Reviews.Author: Rick
Reviews.Content: The iteam works fine, it get hot a lot, also the antenna part its very loose, had to put tape on it..

Reviews.Title: works pretty good
Reviews.Author: jimmy p
Reviews.Content: this works pretty good it does get a little interference (a lot if using a microwave near by) but after adjusting it and adjust the antennas on the camera's it works pretty good really good audio and pretty clear video the video cameras i have i can pick up audio from about 75 to 100 feet away it gets kinda loud if a school bus or trash truck drives by

Reviews.Title: Replacement reciever
Reviews.Author: Gerald Ullery "For God and Country"
Reviews.Content: I've had the X-10 camera system for around 5 years now and the receiver that I had ran 24/7 finally died. This receiver actually costs less than the original and works just as good. I have two different systems as my X-10 is daylight only. I have it hooked up to the PIP side of my 50" HDTV and its picture clarity is just fine, not great though. I was pleased I could get just the receiver instead of trashing a whole system.
